name: Autoroute Debug Test
description: Comprehensive debugging test for autoroute/conditional logic with various edge cases

messages.text: üî¨ Welcome to the Autoroute Debug Test! ||| This sequence will test various conditional scenarios and help identify issues. ||| Let's start by collecting some basic data.
First, let's set your age (we'll test numeric comparisons):
Now let's set your experience level:
Set a boolean preference:
Let's set a string value with special characters:
